author: By AMY TAXIN Associated Press
title: Focus on nursing home workers amid continued virus outbreaks
description: For nearly two months, many nursing homes nationwide have been on virtual lockdown.
content:
For nearly two months, many nursing homes nationwide have been on virtual lockdown.
Families of residents are not allowed inside, vendors have to drop deliveries outside and the only people coming in and out are health care workers and assistants.

author: By RONALD BLUM AP Baseball Writer
title: AP source: MLB to cut amateur draft from 40 rounds to 5
description: NEW YORK (AP) — Major League Baseball will cuts its amateur draft from 40 rounds to five this year, a move that figures to save teams about $30 million.
content:
NEW YORK (AP) Major League Baseball will cuts its amateur draft from 40 rounds to five this year, a move that figures to save teams about $30 million.
